TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract Row

summary.span: 表示表中的行。

span.span: Represents a row in a table.

span.para: Row对象所在的集合。Rows集合包含指定的选定内容、 范围或表格中的所有行。
使用行()，其中是返回单个Row对象的索引号。索引号代表所选内容、 范围或表中的行的位置。
使用方法，以向表中添加行。
使用属性修改Row对象中的单个单元格。
The Row object is a member of the collection. The Rows collection includes all the rows in the specified selection, range, or table.
Use Rows(), where is the index number, to return a single Row object. The index number represents the position of the row in the selection, range, or table.
Use the method to add a row to a table.
Use the property to modify the individual cells in a Row object.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdRowAlignment Alignment { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdRowAlignment get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdRowAlignment value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置常量值，该值代表指定行的对齐方式。

span.span: Returns or sets a constant that represents the alignment for the specified rows.

span.para: WdRowAlignment可以是下列常量之一：
WdRowAlignment can be one of the following constants:

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int AllowBreakAcrossPages { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 确定表一行或多行中的文本是否允许拆分在分页符。

span.span: Determines if the text in a table row or rows are allowed to split across a page break.

span.para: 该属性返回的值可以是True、 False或wdUndefined （只将某些指定文本允许拆分）。
The property return values can be True, False or wdUndefined (only some of the specified text is allowed to split).

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Application As Application

summary.span: 返回对象代表 Microsoft Word 应用程序。

span.span: Returns a object that represents the Microsoft Word application.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::Borders ^ Borders { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::Borders ^ get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::Borders ^ value); };

summary.span: 返回集合，代表指定对象的所有边框。

span.span: Returns a collection that represents all the borders for the specified object.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Cells As Cells
public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::Cells ^ Cells { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::Cells ^ get(); };

summary.span: 返回代表列、 行、 选定内容或范围中的表格单元格的集合。

span.span: Returns a collection that represents the table cells in a column, row, selection, or range.

MemberSignature.Value: public Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range ConvertToText (ref object Separator, ref object NestedTables);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range ConvertToText([in]object& Separator, [in]object& NestedTables) runtime managed
Public Function ConvertToText (Optional ByRef Separator As Object, Optional ByRef NestedTables As Object) As Range

param.name: Separator

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: 用以分隔被转换的列 (段落标记分隔被转换的行) 的字符。

span.span: The character that delimits the converted columns (paragraph marks delimit the converted rows).

param.span: 可以是任何以下常量：wdSeparateByCommaswdSeparateByDefaultListSeparatorwdSeparateByParagraphswdSeparateByTabs 默认

span.span: Can be any following constants:wdSeparateByCommaswdSeparateByDefaultListSeparatorwdSeparateByParagraphswdSeparateByTabs Default

param.name: NestedTables

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: 如此 如果嵌套的表格转换为文本。

span.span: True if nested tables are converted to text.

param.span: 如果此参数，则忽略不是wdSeparateByParagraphs。

span.span: This argument is ignored if is not wdSeparateByParagraphs.
The default value is True.

summary.span: 将表格转换为文本并返回代表带分隔符的文本的对象。

span.span: Converts a table to text and returns a object that represents the delimited text.

span.para: 应用到ConvertToText方法时对象中删除对象。若要维护引用表的转换后的内容，必须将分配到新的对象变量ConvertToText方法返回的Range对象。

When you apply the ConvertToText method to a object, the object is deleted. To maintain a reference to the converted contents of the table, you must assign the Range object returned by the ConvertToText method to a new object variable.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range ConvertToTextOld([in]object& Separator) runtime managed
Public Function ConvertToTextOld (Optional ByRef Separator As Object) As Range

summary.span: 仅供内部使用。

span.span: Reserved for internal use.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Creator As Integer
public: property int Creator { int get(); };

summary.span: 返回一个 32 位整数，它指示在其中创建指定的对象的应用程序。

span.span: Returns a 32-bit integer that indicates the application in which the specified object was created.

remarks.span:
如果指定的对象在 Microsoft Word 中创建的此属性返回十六进制数字 4d535744，表示字符串"MSWD。"此值也可以由常量wdCreatorCode。主要设计
Creator属性用于 Macintosh，其中每个应用程序具有四个字符的创建者代码。例如，Microsoft Word 具有 MSWD 的创建者代码。有关此属性的其他信息，请咨询的语言参考 Microsoft Office Macintosh Edition 中包含的帮助。

span.para: If the specified object was created in Microsoft Word, this property returns the hexadecimal number 4D535744, which represents the string "MSWD." This value can also be represented by the constant wdCreatorCode.

The Creator property was primarily designed to be used on the Macintosh, where each application has a four-character creator code. For example, Microsoft Word has the creator code MSWD. For additional information about this property, consult the language reference Help included with Microsoft Office Macintosh Edition.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Delete() runtime managed

summary.span: 用于删除指定的对象。

span.span: Deletes the specified object.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int HeadingFormat { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 确定如果指定的行的格式设置为表格标题。

span.span: Determines if the specified row or rows are formatted as a table heading.

span.para: 行格式设置为表格跨越多个页时，将重复表格标题。
可能属性值可以是True、 False或wdUndefined。
Rows formatted as table headings are repeated when a table spans more than one page.
Possible property values can be True, False or wdUndefined.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property float Height { float get(); void set(float value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置表中的指定行的高度。

span.span: Returns or sets the height of the specified row in a table.

span.para: 如果指定行的属性为wdRowHeightAuto，则Height返回wdUndefined。设置Height属性会将HeightRule设置为wdRowHeightAtLeast。
If the property of the specified row is wdRowHeightAuto, Height returns wdUndefined. Setting the Height property sets HeightRule to wdRowHeightAtLeast.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdRowHeightRule HeightRule { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdRowHeightRule get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdRowHeightRule value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置用于确定指定行的高度的规则。

span.span: Returns or sets the rule for determining the height of the specified row.

span.para: 可以是下列常量之一：
can be one of the following constants:

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ID { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置指定对象的标识标签当前文档保存为 Web 页时。

span.span: Returns or sets the identifying label for the specified object when the current document is saved as a Web page.

span.para: 除了对象，您可以使用一个标签作为超链接引用其他网页或当前文档。
With the exception of the object, you can use a label as a hyperlink reference from other Web pages or from within the current document.

public: property int Index { int get(); };

summary.span: 返回一个整数值，该值代表集合中的项目的位置。

span.span: Returns an Integer that represents the position of an item in a collection.

summary.span: 确定指定的列或行是否为表格中的第一个。

span.span: Determines if the specified column or row is the first one in the table.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsLast As Boolean
public: property bool IsLast { bool get(); };

summary.span: 确定指定的列或行是否为表格中的最后一个。

span.span: Determines if the specified column or row is the last one in the table.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property float LeftIndent { float get(); void set(float value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置用于指定的表格行的 单个 值，该值代表左缩进值 (以磅为单位)。

span.span: Returns or sets a Single that represents the left indent value (in points) for the specified table row.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property NestingLevel As Integer
public: property int NestingLevel { int get(); };

summary.span: 返回指定行的嵌套级别。

span.span: Returns the nesting level of the specified row.

span.para: 最外层表的嵌套级别为 1。每个连续嵌套表格的嵌套级别是高于上表之一。
The outermost table has a nesting level of 1. The nesting level of each successively nested table is one higher than the previous table.

public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::Row ^ Next { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::Row ^ get(); };

public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::Row ^ Previous { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::Row ^ get(); };

MemberSignature.Value: Default Public ReadOnly Property Range As Range
public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::Range ^ default { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::Range ^ get(); };

summary.span: 返回对象，它代表指定对象中包含的文档部分。

span.span: Returns a object that represents the portion of a document that's contained in the specified object.

span.para: 有关从文档返回一个区域或从形状集合返回形状范围的信息，请参阅方法。
For information about returning a range from a document or returning a shape range from a collection of shapes, see the method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Select() runtime managed

summary.span: 选择指定的对象。

span.span: Selects the specified object.

span.para: 使用此方法后，使用属性以使用选定项。
After using this method, use the property to work with the selected items.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetHeight([in]float32 RowHeight, [in]valuetype Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdRowHeightRule HeightRule) runtime managed
Public Sub SetHeight (RowHeight As Single, HeightRule As WdRowHeightRule)

param.name: RowHeight

span.span: Required Single.

param.span: 一行或多行的高度，以磅为单位。

span.span: The height of the row or rows, in points.

param.name: HeightRule

span.span: Required .

param.span: 用于确定指定行的高度的规则。WdRowHeightRule可以是下列常量之一：wdRowHeightAtLeastwdRowHeightExactlywdRowHeightAuto

span.span: The rule for determining the height of the specified rows.WdRowHeightRule can be one of the following constants:wdRowHeightAtLeastwdRowHeightExactlywdRowHeightAuto

summary.span: 设置表格行的高度。

span.span: Sets the height of table rows.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetLeftIndent([in]float32 LeftIndent, [in]valuetype Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdRulerStyle RulerStyle) runtime managed
Public Sub SetLeftIndent (LeftIndent As Single, RulerStyle As WdRulerStyle)

param.name: LeftIndent

span.span: Required Single.

param.span: 指定的一行或多行的当前左边缘与所需左边缘之间的距离（以磅为单位）。

span.span: The distance (in points) between the current left edge of the specified row or rows and the desired left edge.

param.name: RulerStyle

span.span: Required .

param.span: 控制的左缩进更改时，Microsoft Word 调整表格的方式。WdRulerStyle可以是下列常量之一： wdAdjustNone – 调整左边的缘一行或多行，通过转向左侧或右侧保留所有列的宽度。

span.span: Controls the way Microsoft Word adjusts the table when the left indent is changed.WdRulerStyle can be one of the following constants: wdAdjustNone – Adjusts the left edge of row or rows, preserving the width of all columns by shifting them to the left or right.
This is the default value.

param.span: wdAdjustSameWidth – 调整表格的右边缘的位置保留的所有单元格的宽度设置为相同的值的指定的行中的第一列的左边缘。

span.span: wdAdjustSameWidth – Adjusts the left edge of the first column, preserving the position of the right edge of the table by setting the widths of all the cells in the specified row or rows to the same value.

param.span: wdAdjustFirstColumn – 调整仅在第一列的左边的缘保留其他列和表格的右边缘的位置。

span.span: wdAdjustFirstColumn – Adjusts the left edge of the first column only, preserving the positions of the other columns and the right edge of the table.

param.span: wdAdjustProportional – 调整左边缘的第一列中，通过按比例调整指定的行或多行中的所有单元格的宽度保持表的右边缘的位置。

span.span: wdAdjustProportional – Adjusts the left edge of the first column, preserving the position of the right edge of the table by proportionally adjusting the widths of all the cells in the specified row or rows.

summary.span: 设置表格中一行或多行的缩进。

span.span: Sets the indentation for a row or rows in a table.

span.para: WdRulerStyle行为上述适用于左对齐的表。中心和右对齐表格的WdRulerStyle行为可以是意外;在这些情况下，应谨慎使用SetLeftIndent方法。

The WdRulerStyle behavior described above applies to left-aligned tables. The WdRulerStyle behavior for center- and right-aligned tables can be unexpected; in these cases, the SetLeftIndent method should be used with care.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Shading As Shading

summary.span: 返回对象的引用指定对象的底纹格式。

span.span: Returns a object that refers to the shading formatting for the specified object.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property float SpaceBetweenColumns { float get(); void set(float value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置指定行的相邻列中的文字之间的距离 （以磅为单位）。

span.span: Returns or sets the distance (in points) between text in adjacent columns of the specified row.
